Options.label: Everyone Gets a Chance
Options.rule: Everyone gets a chance to answer every question!
subRules: For each question, every team gets a chance to answer.

Options.label: First to Buzz!
Options.rule: The first person to buzz in after the question is asked, gets to answer the question first.
subRules: If the person who buzzes doesn't get it correct, the next person to buzz in gets to answer
NOTE: The game doesn't have any buzz-in feature, so you'll have to use your own buzzers
Options.suggestion: Be sure to use the 'Host View' to see the answers while asking the question.

Options.label: Everyone Gets a Chance
Options.rule: Everyone gets a chance to pick a question from the board.
subRules: The game will automatically cycle through the list of teams

Options.label: Last Person to Get it Right
Options.rule: The first person to buzz-in AND get the question correct gets to pick the next question
subRules: If nobody gets the current question correct, the last person to got a question correct continues picking.
Options.suggestion: If using this setting, the 'Answering Questions' setting should be 'First to Buzz!'

Options.label: Randomly Suggested by Game
Options.rule: The questions are randomly suggested by the game.
subRules: The host still has to pick the suggested question.
Options.suggestion: If using this setting for 'Selecting Questions', also use it for 'Who Goes First?'

Options.label: Random Team
Options.rule: The first team is picked randomly.
subRules: The team will be picked from the list of teams loaded when the game is Started
All teams should enter game code and setup their team name before clicking "Start Game"

Options.label: Host Selects Team
Options.rule: The host will select the team who goes first.
subRules: The team will be picked from the list of teams loaded when the game is Started
All teams should enter game code and setup their team name before clicking "Start Game"

Options.label: Randomly Suggested by Game
Options.rule: The first question is randomly suggested by the game.
subRules: The host still has to pick the suggested question.
Options.suggestion: If using this setting for 'Who Goes First?', also use it for 'Selecting Questions'

Options.label: 15 Seconds to Answer.
Options.rule: Each teams gets 15 seconds to answer the question!
subRules: Time starts after the question is read

Options.label: ${VALUE} seconds to Answer.
Options.rule: Each team gets ${VALUE} seconds to answer the question!
subRules: Time starts after the question is read

Options.label: Classic
Options.rule: For FINAL JEOPARDY, a team can only wager as many points as they have.

Options.label: Max Wager is Highest Score
Options.rule: For FINAL JEOPARDY, you can wager as much as the HIGHEST OVERALL SCORE!
subRules: The max amount that a team can wager is based on the highest overall score!
So, you could come from behind & beat the team in the lead 🙂
Or, you could lose it all and possibly end up with negative points. 🙃
